value.fullName: Unlimited self-service webcasts for up to 100 participants. Includes integrated streaming video & broadcast audio support. Multiple speaker lines per event & unlimited on-demand viewing for 12 months. Additional premium features included.
value.label: Unlimited self-service webcasts for up to 100 participants. Includes integrated streaming video & broadcast audio support. Multiple speaker lines per event & unlimited on-demand viewing for 12 months. Additional premium features included.

value.fullName: Unlimited self-service webcasts for up to 300 attendees. Includes integrated broadcast audio and webcam streaming and unlimited on-demand viewing for 12 months.
